name: Praying For Rain
description:
Praying For Rain is a game I created for my 3rd game jam (Mini Jam 110: Sacrifice)! Everything was created within a 72 hour window. Code, sprites, UI, and sound effects were done by me (Arcrutus). The incredibly cool background music loop (Track 06) was done by the talented Abstraction.

The theme of the jam was "Sacrifice" and the limitation was "Failure is Inevitable".

In Praying For Rain you play the role of Pinchy Glove, an assistant of the gods.

  • Aid the little villagers in their sacrifice as they endlessly fling themselves off a cliff.
  • Catch them before they hit the ground and read their innermost thoughts, then send them off where they need to go!
  • Your resource bars will constantly decrease over time, when any of the bars reaches 0 it is game over.
  • Successful sacrifices grant you points and bonus resources to temporarily stave off your inevitable demise.
  • See how many points you can rack up!
